<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ironblood Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6011) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=701" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You are unarmored.

</column>

---

You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow. You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group; and have the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661), [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=667), [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=708), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) traits. 

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12th level, to 4 at 16th level, and to 5 at 20th level.

<title level="2">Ironblood Stance leads to...</title>
[Ironblood Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6032)
name: Ironblood Stance
